name: sfchronicle
text:
Erica Chan Coffman and her family were renovating a home in Sonoma County for the past three years as a getaway and vacation rental. Then the Glass Fire erupted.

A firefighter checking on the property a day later snapped photos of what remained.

text: The #ZoggFire burning in Shasta County is now 90% contained, Cal Fire said Thursday. Containment of the fire, which has killed four people, has been steady for days. The blaze is 56,338 acres in size. https://t.co/zy7fuPRiKS

name: sfchronicle
text:
RT @demianbulwa: What a great California tale:

SHIPWRECKED ON LITTLE POTATO SLOUGH

name: sfchronicle
text: Chris Willson‚Äôs plan is not to turn his 2,500-ton boat into an operational cruise ship, but renovate it in the hope of putting it to use as a specialty theater, hotel or event center ‚Äî at least when the pandemic has passed. https://t.co/f2ZwOBLPBS
